promos3Columns.title: Bootstrap 3 Built
promos3Columns.text: The 'Modern Business' website template by Start Bootstrap is built with Bootstrap 3. Make sure you're up to date with latest Bootstrap documentation!

promos3Columns.title: Ready to Style & Edit
promos3Columns.text: You're ready to go with this pre-built page structure, now all you need to do is add your own custom stylings! You can see some free themes over at Bootswatch, or come up with your own using the Bootstrap customizer!

promos3Columns.title: Many Page Options
promos3Columns.text: This template features many common pages that you might see on a business website. Pages include: about, contact, portfolio variations, blog, pricing, FAQ, 404, services, and general multi-purpose pages.

promoWide.title: Modern Business: A Clean & Simple Full Website Template by Start Bootstrap
promoWide.text: A complete website design featuring various single page templates from Start Bootstraps library of free HTML starter templates.

features.title: Modern Business Features Include:
items: Unstyled: Add Your Own Style and Content!
Open Source: Use for any project, private or commercial!

cta.title: 'Modern Business' is a ready-to-use, Bootstrap 3 updated, multi-purpose HTML theme!
